QuestData.Title: Joining the Fight
QuestData.Description: Lao-Chin's archers will need these arrows down at the bridge. Can you bring them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Quiver of Shado-Pan Fire Arrows to Lao-Chin the Iron Belly at Dusklight Bridge.
QuestData.RewardText: Taran Zhu told me what became of my camp. I would have stopped it if I could, but the attacks from the bridge have not let up.$B$BThank you for bringing these arrows - my archers will make good use of them.
